title: SIC! SIC! SIC!
html:
SIC! SIC! SIC!

“While she won't admit it, [the character] clearly is a woman in denial.” [From a play review in The Berkshire Eagle, 16 June 1992. Submitted by Norman R. Shapiro, Wesleyan University.]
